FuncDef: The display switch-port sfu command displays the status of the switch port on an SFU.
Examples: Slot:    ChipNo:  InputPort:    Status:    OutputPort:    Status:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a trap indicating a physical entity fault is generated, you can run the display switch-port command to view the status of the switch port on the SFU to locate the cause of the trap.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
